directions: Mix tuna, soy sauce, cilantro, 2 tablespoons olive oil, lemon juice, ginger, eggs, kosher salt, black pepper, and almond meal in a food processor or by hand until it reaches a firm consistency. Form mixture into four patties.
Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a grill pan or skillet over medium heat. Cook tuna burgers in the hot oil until patties are set and and browned on both sides, about 5 minutes per side.
ingredients: kosher salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Paleo Tuna Burgers
